subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Being the best player at his position never to win a Super Bowl is a double-edged distinction that Brian Urlacher, the quarterback of the Bears’ defense, will have to live with for at least another season.
snippet: Being the best player at his position never to win a Super Bowl is a double-edged distinction that Brian Urlacher, the quarterback of the Bears’ defense, will have to live with for at least another season.
